flyer1.Explanation: {{1}} kuyavuya ukwazisa ngophehlelelo lwewebhusayithi yethu entsha. Ibandakanya uluhlu olukhulayo lweempawu, ezifana:
flyer1.Notifications: Ngokufaka idilesi ye-imeyile okanye inombolo yeselula uya kuba nako ukufumana izaziso ezibalulekileyo nge-imeyile okanye ngomyalezo obhaliweyo.
flyer1.GetStarted: Ukuqalisa, kwibhrawuza yakho yewebhu nceda ufake ngononophelo :
